price: 15. Tokkel ta tablen digaala baaba innaa hinnak isin ablewaytaanaa?
arabic: أَفَسِحۡرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: afasiḥ'run hādhā am antum lā tub'ṣirūna
